title: What is the highest inflation (money) ever achieved? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hungary, about a year after WWII reached 13,000,000,000 percent a month in July 1946. 150,000 percent per day at worst! They changed their money currency and it worked somewhat until communism took over. Zimbabwe achieved 80,000,000,000 percent in November 2008. Yugoslavia, Germany would be next worst. 60 percent interest rate in Venezuela announced this week doesn't seem so bad compared there.
The highest inflation rateever recordedtook place in Zimbabve. The inflation rate was so high that the prices were doubling every 36 hours for a year straight.
